item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am currently pursuing a PhD in political science at the University of Limerick, Ireland. Supervised by Dr. Rory Costello, my dissertation focuses on political identities in Western Europe throughout the 2008-2014 crises. I am also a Teaching Assistant in comparative European politics, and Politics of the European Union. PhD dissertation (completion expected in June 2022) Title: The causal effect of party system polarisation on positive and negative partisanship between 1999-2020 in Western Europe
